abstract: A freelance beauty consultant, a fourth-grade teacher and a psychiatric nurse are among the 12 New Yorkers who will decide the fate of Rajat K. Gupta, a former director of Goldman Sachs and Procter & Gamble.
snippet: A freelance beauty consultant, a fourth-grade teacher and a psychiatric nurse are among the 12 New Yorkers who will decide the fate of Rajat K. Gupta, a former director of Goldman Sachs and Procter & Gamble.
lead_paragraph: A freelance beauty consultant, a fourth-grade teacher and a psychiatric nurse are among the 12 New Yorkers who will decide the fate of Rajat K. Gupta.

headline.main: Jury Is Seated in Rajat Gupta Trial
